verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068> came also unto me <WH559>, saying,
Thou shalt not take <WH3947> thee a wife <WH802>, neither shalt thou have sons <WH1121> or daughters <WH1323>, in this place <WH4725>.

For thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068> concerning the sons <WH1121> and concerning the daughters <WH1323> that are born <WH3205> in this place <WH4725>, and concerning their mothers <WH517> that bare <WH3205> them <WH1>, and concerning their fathers that begat <WH3209> them in this land <WH776>:

They shall die <WH4191> grievous <WH8463> deaths <WH4463>: they shall not be lamented <WH5594>, neither shall they be buried <WH6912>; they shall be as dung <WH1828> upon the face <WH6440> of the ground <WH127>; and they shall be consumed <WH3615> by the sword <WH2719>, and by famine <WH7458>; and their dead bodies <WH5038> shall be food <WH3978> for the birds <WH5775> of the heavens <WH8064>, and for the beasts <WH929> of the earth <WH776>.

For thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068>, Enter <WH935> not into the house <WH1004> of mourning <WH4798>, neither go <WH3212> to lament <WH5594>, neither bemoan <WH5110> them <WH622>; for I have taken away my peace <WH7965> from this people <WH5971>, saith <WH5002> Jehovah <WH3068>, even lovingkindness <WH2617> and tender mercies <WH7356>.

Both great <WH1419> and small <WH6996> shall die <WH4191> in this land <WH776>; they shall not be buried <WH6912>, neither shall men lament <WH5594> for them <WH1413>, nor cut themselves <WH7139>, nor make themselves bald for them;

neither shall men break <WH6536> bread for them in mourning <WH60>, to comfort <WH5162> them for the dead <WH4191>; neither shall men give them the cup <WH3563> of consolation <WH8575> to drink <WH8248> for their father <WH1> or for their mother <WH517>.
And thou shalt not go <WH935> into the house <WH1004> of feasting <WH4960> to sit <WH3427> with them <WH398>, to eat and to drink <WH8354>.

For thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>: Behold <WH7673>, I will cause to cease out of this place <WH4725>, before your eyes <WH5869> and in your days <WH3117>, the voice <WH6963> of mirth <WH8342> and the voice <WH6963> of gladness <WH8057>, the voice <WH6963> of the bridegroom <WH2860> and the voice <WH6963> of the bride <WH3618>.

And it shall come to pass <WH5046>, when thou shalt show this people <WH5971> all these words <WH1697>, and they shall say <WH559> unto thee <WH3068>, Wherefore hath Jehovah pronounced <WH1696> all this great <WH1419> evil <WH7451> against us <WH5771>? or what is our iniquity? or what is our sin <WH2403> that we have committed <WH2398> against Jehovah <WH3068> our God <WH430>?

Then shalt thou say <WH559> unto them <WH1>, Because your fathers have forsaken <WH5800> me <WH5002>, saith Jehovah <WH3068>, and have walked <WH3212> after <WH310> other <WH312> gods <WH430>, and have served <WH5647> them <WH7812>, and have worshipped them <WH5800>, and have forsaken me <WH8104>, and have not kept my law <WH8451>;

and ye have done <WH6213> evil <WH7489> more than your fathers <WH1>; for <WH2009>, behold, ye walk <WH1980> every one <WH376> after <WH310> the stubbornness <WH8307> of his evil <WH7451> heart <WH3820>, so that ye hearken not unto me <WH8085>:

therefore will I cast <WH2904> you forth out of this land <WH776> into the land <WH776> that ye have not known <WH3045>, neither ye nor your fathers <WH1>; and there shall ye serve <WH5647> other <WH312> gods <WH430> day <WH3119> and night <WH3915>; for I will show <WH5414> you no favor <WH2594>.

Therefore <WH3117>, behold, the days come <WH935>, saith <WH5002> Jehovah <WH3068>, that it shall no more be said <WH559>, As Jehovah <WH3068> liveth <WH2416>, that brought up <WH5927> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>;

but <WH3068>, As Jehovah liveth <WH2416>, that brought up <WH5927> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> from the land <WH776> of the north <WH6828>, and from all the countries <WH776> whither he had driven <WH5080> them <WH7725>. And I will bring them again into their land <WH127> that I gave <WH5414> unto their fathers <WH1>.

Behold <WH7971>, I will send for many <WH7227> fishers <WH1771>, saith <WH5002> Jehovah <WH3068>, and they shall fish <WH1770> them up <WH310>; and afterward I will send <WH7971> for many <WH7227> hunters <WH6719>, and they shall hunt <WH6679> them from every mountain <WH2022>, and from every hill <WH1389>, and out of the clefts <WH5357> of the rocks <WH5553>.
For mine eyes <WH5869> are upon all their ways <WH1870>; they are not hid <WH5641> from my face <WH6440>, neither is their iniquity <WH5771> concealed <WH6845> from <WH5048> mine eyes <WH5869>.

And first <WH7223> I will recompense <WH7999> their iniquity <WH5771> and their sin <WH2403> double <WH4932>, because they have polluted <WH2490> my land <WH776> with the carcasses <WH5038> of their detestable <WH8251> things <WH4390>, and have filled mine inheritance <WH5159> with their abominations <WH8441>.

O Jehovah <WH3068>, my strength <WH5797>, and my stronghold <WH5797>, and my refuge <WH4498> in the day <WH3117> of affliction <WH6869>, unto thee shall the nations <WH1471> come <WH935> from the ends <WH657> of the earth <WH776>, and shall say <WH559>, Our fathers <WH1> have inherited <WH5157> nought but lies <WH8267>, even vanity <WH1892> and things wherein there is no profit <WH3276>.
Shall a man <WH120> make <WH6213> unto himself gods <WH430>, which yet are no gods <WH430>?

Therefore <WH3045>, behold, I will cause them to know, this once <WH6471> will I cause them to know <WH3045> my hand <WH3027> and my might <WH1369>; and they shall know <WH3045> that my name <WH8034> is Jehovah <WH3068>.
